content:

content:

Well, it looks rather unusual! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Better see it if/when they screen it here.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: SNAKES on a PLANE
content:
Judging by this trailer this movie is gonna be clich, short, boring, and has worse acting, a bad story, gives a wrong view on snakes, etc. etc. etc.
A movie everyone should download just to piss of the makers.-----------------

title: Re: SNAKES on a PLANE
content:
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img]

I couldn't help but laugh! Even the movie title is so unimaginatively stupid, that it could be good if this was a comedy, but I doubt so.[hr]The human brain is not user-friendly...

title: Re: SNAKES on a PLANE
content:
"I couldn't help but laugh! Even the movie title is so unimaginatively stupid, that it could be good if this was a comedy, but I doubt so."
[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-lol.gif[/img] I know, I know!! I'm expecting it to be one of the worst movies plotwise.. Here's plot outline from imdb.com: "On board a flight over the Pacific Ocean, an assassin, bent on killing a passenger who's a witness in protective custody, lets loose a crate full of deadly snakes." [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smoke2.gif[/img] Can't find any tag-line yet! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] But I can imagine it being something like "This summer.. the snake bites.. hard." [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rolleyes.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Stupid Movie
content:
Looks like a movie that'd last... about 5 minutes.

Badguy: "A crate of snakes!!" *opens*
Guys: "Ahh! Snakes!!"
Badguy: "Haha!"
Police: "Die!" *shoots*
Badguy: "Gahh I'm dead!"
Smart Guy: "Lets throw the snakes out the door!"
Guys: "Ok!" *Throws snakes"
The End!!

Oh, and the best sequel!!
Guy on Ground: "Oh, no, its raining snakes!!" *dies*-Genius314
[url=http://planetck.spatang.com]PlanetCK[/url]

title: Re: Oh, the brilliance...
content:
I'm fearing this would have the same effect on snakes like the movie 'Jaws' had on sharks... Snake extermination. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-redeyes.gif[/img] ___________________
DaVince, Yet Another Amateur Game Creator! :P

title: Re: Snake
content:
Hah, I'd have no worry about that.. I'm more worried that this movie will make people invent the concept of "party snake" or something like that because this movie is so crazy/stupid..

Hey, look at me! Party Snakes! These are completely harmless! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-stoned.gif[/img]
*stuffs snakes in pants*
OUCH!! Uh oh.. I'm not feeling so well.. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-bloody.gif[/img]

Another sequel possibility: A snake managed to lay eggs somewhere in the plane. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-offended.gif[/img] Something mysterious substance has caused mutations in the baby snakes (thus making them more stronger and bloodthirsty). Accidentally the main character of the first movie returns to the plane on his/her way back home from the city he/she was travelling in the first movie.. Bad luck, he/she is in the exactly same plane where the horrors happened sometime ago! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] Oh no -- the snakes happen to do their first preying exactly on that specific flight!3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Snake
content:
You know, no one's gonna ride planes anymore.
I mean, besides all the REAL stuff going on, theres also Lost, and this, and a bunch of other shows/movies where bad stuff happens on planes. Now they're gonna have a snake detector right next to the metal one.-Genius314

title: Re: Snake
content:
I remember when a plane in a Richard Scarry book was overloaded and it split open, and Noah the Boa wrapped himself around the plane to hold it together. He was a hero.

And now his slithery brethren are messing up his grand legacy of heroism. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img]

Goshdarn Hollywood. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img] ----------

title: Re: Snake
content:
I know this one's old...but I couldn't resist. Went to see the movie on premiere night, most audience particiation *ever*. I'm talking IMAX cinema, people cheering, clapping, reciting lines...

We made SoaP shirts, people would randomly shake our hands on the street; I was a fantastic night.

On another note - worst movie *ever*.------------------
[url=http://www.szevvy.net]www.szevvy.net[/url], for all your Wombat needs. You know you want to.
A member of the LevelLord fan club.

title: Re: SNAKES on a PLANE
content:
I read... I think in a blog from a FPS developer, or maybe somebody officially Xbox 360 related or something, really unsure... that since he went to the cinama expecting it to be complete junk, but also because it ended up being funny, it was one of the best movies he'd seen in a while.
I suppose if the creators of the movie in fact didn't take themselves too seriously, this movie could be a nice watch still.
I'll give it a chance after all, if I ever come across it.Retodon8
